title: Inclusive Language Learning Design Through Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Language education design reflecting diverse learner needs by utilizing learning analytics tools in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Design and apply at least three types of personalized language learning content based on learning analytics data.
Develop at least five microlearning activities considering educational inclusivity (e.g., integrating captioning for hearing-impaired learners).
Establish and implement intervention strategies to reduce dropout rates by at least 20%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
